ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrbagev1.d | |- D = { h e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' h " NN ) e. Fin } |

| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_psrbagev1 | |- ( ph -> ( ( B oF .x. G ) : I --> C /\ ( B oF .x. G ) finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> ( B oF .x. G ) : I --> C ) |
